column2: tableS7 <- filt_maaslin_all %>% subset(., .$qval < 0.1 & abs(.$Estimate) > 2) %>% subset(., .$metadata != "sample_type" & .$metadata != "log10.Final_reads") %>% dplyr::select(c("feature", "metadata", "Estimate", "qval")) %>%
"Change estimate of CLR transformed count" = round(`Change estimate of CLR transformed count`, 3),
